description: The Fireball Butterscotch Coffee is a rich and decadent drink perfect for chilly mornings or evenings. The&nbsp;coffee is infused with the warm flavors of Fireball cinnamon whiskey and butterscotch schnapps, resulting in a smooth, bursting-of-flavor cup of coffee that will please any palate.Thanks to its unique flavor profile, the Fireball Butterscotch Coffee quickly becomes a popular choice among coffee drinkers. So if you're in search of something special and new to sip on, a nice, warm concoction of the Fireball Butterscotch Coffee would be up for the task!
name: Fireball Butterscotch Coffee
